Text: Virus AlertMy computer received a virus today and appears to have forward the virus to everyone in my address book If you have received an email from me this afternoon and have opened please run an antivirus program If you have not opened it please delete I have no idea what the virus does but I have not experience any problems Herb

Dear Customers Christmas is around the corner and this year we will be making a donation to the Red Cross on behalf of each of you We are asking you to please email us your home address so we can make certain that everyone will be included in this donation Thank you for your cooperation Respectfully Herb Lee mailto
